content: Hey everyone! Denise here -- I am a mom of 2 (soon to be 3) and we are so excited!! This is my first girl so it's extra special. Any other Texas mamas here?
Having a hard time with nausea in this pregnancy :( Anyone have tips on how they dealt with it or just words of encouragement?
Struggling with breastfeeding my newborn. Any tips or advice from experienced moms? Feeling overwhelmed
Welcome Denise! I'm not from Texas, but I have some family down in Galveston!!
Samantha, look into getting a lactation consultant! It made a world of a differnce when it came to my baby's latch. Rooting for you girl!
Counting down the days until we get to meet our little one. The anticipation is real, and our hearts are full of love.
Took some time for self-care today with a prenatal massage, and it was pure bliss. Remember to prioritize yourself, mamas!
